name: Composio Tool Router
description: Access 1000+ third-party tools via Composio (Gmail, Slack, GitHub, Notion, etc.)

enabled.description: Enable or disable the Composio plugin

apiKey.description: Composio API key (or set COMPOSIO_API_KEY env var)

defaultUserId.description: Default user ID for session scoping

allowedToolkits.description: Restrict to specific toolkits (e.g., github, gmail)

blockedTools.description: Map of toolkit to blocked tool slugs

defaultArgs.description: Map of toolkit name to default arguments auto-injected on execute (e.g., {"sentry": {"organization_id_or_slug": "my-org"}})

defaultUserId.label: Default User ID
defaultUserId.help: Default user ID for session scoping
